question: Analyze the hiring trends of technology companies in the fintech industry over the past year.

subtasks.task: Identify all technology companies operating in the fintech industry by querying the CompanyInfo table.
Gather detailed hiring information from the CompanyHiringDetail table for the identified fintech companies, filtering the records to the past year.
Analyze the hiring data to identify trends in job titles and required skills for positions advertised in the past year.
Summarize the findings and prepare insights on how hiring practices in fintech have evolved compared to previous years.
